ygData.subject: Re: Just a tought
ygData.msgSnippet: HERE HERE TO THAT!!! I agree 100% :) I ve been on many mailing lists for a while and all I hear is people complaining about the other classes being better...
ygData.messageBody:
HERE HERE TO THAT!!! I agree 100% :)



I 've been on many mailing lists for a while and all I hear is people
complaining about the other classes being better...
the mages complained about the necro the necro about the mages and so on.
If verant says the classes are balanced I trust em (except for the rogues wich still dont have poisoning)
Of course the neighbor's grass is always more green.
So if you dont like the class just check out another but please stop pissing me off with worthless "he got this and that, Im jealous".
Necro is a hard class to play if you are not good with tactics , you might try a bard or something

Ghast Shin'Ra - Tunare
